---
title: Biopsychosocial Model of Health
---

a model of health that breaks the patient down into:

- Social factors (culture, social interactions, sick role)
- Psychological factors (Illness behavior, beliefs, coping strategies, emotions, distress)
- Biological factors ([Biomedical model]({{< var ref-biomedical-model.path >}}): Physiological dysfunction + neurophysiological changes )
